page.title: 06SPORTS AND GAMES, RHYL
page.content: Rhyl Sports Centre is 1/4 mile from the town centre. It has a large swimming pool and a learners' pool. There are squash and table tennis rooms, a gymnasium, pool room and indoor sports pitch. People can do weightlifting and karate there. Out- side are 2 large, all-weather, flood- lit pitches for hockey, rounders, etc. Across the road is Rhyl Town Football ground. Next to that are the Coronation and Botanical Gardens which have been re-developed recently. There are 11 all-weather tennis courts, 2 bowling greens, a putting green and a large playing field for cricket and rounders. There are also sports changing rooms. There are pretty ornamental flower gardens around the pond and along the paths. A children's playground has wooden rocking horses, slides, monkey bars, etc.
